item.title: Linux News Roundup - September 2023
item.description: Introduction: As September 2023 draws to a close, it's time to take a look at the latest developments in the world of Linux. This open-source operating system continues to evolve and expand its presence in various domains, from desktop computing to servers and embedded systems. In this roundup, we'll highlight some of the most noteworthy news and updates from the Linux ecosystem this month. Linux Kernel 5.16 September brought us the release of Linux Kernel 5.
